vote.title: Vote
vote.description: Represents a single vote cast by a user for a specific option.

optionId.description: The ID of the voting option selected.

userName.description: The name of the user who cast the vote.

/votes/{voteId}.description: Stores individual votes. The document ID is the user's UID. Publicly readable for results, but only the authenticated user can create their own vote. A special admin role can delete all votes to reset the poll.
